messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
You’re a Pokémon Trainer, and so am I!
Our eyes met, so battle we must!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Don’t be shy about talking to
Trainers you’d like to battle.Pokémon grow stronger and stronger
from battling.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Did you get better since we met?
I... Well, here, just look!
